title: Toxic ban
body: You guys gave me a chat ban because my words didn't fit the summoners code. you guys dont care if someone goes afk or they just feed by running down mid all the time. When i yell at someone its because they do that but im the one that has to be careful to peoples feelings when they screw with my enjoyment get better at who you ban

replies.body:
Intentional feeders and AFK players are also detected by the instant feedback system Riot uses. I can guarantee you that players that intentionally run down mid and feed do get banned. Just look at Tyler1's account. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

to Aspects1 

when i take this game as a competitive game yet im tuck in elo hell where every game i have an afk or someone thats just feeding intentionally they i will get mad because then why should i play this game. It would make sence if riot banned them or did something to them but they get no such thing so when you try  to climb in ranked and you want to win but someone goes afk because "got to go eat food"," I dont want to play","Had to take the dogs for a walk". Then i will get mad i just want riot to improve there system that i once knew and loved. Rather then now when i want to just cry every game because of this.

First of all click REPLY under a post if you want to answer someone.

Second, Riot gave you a chat ban cause you flamed in several games. 

You ask for a System where someone which makes a failure once (like going afk) gets banned. Don't you see the irony? You would have been banned after your first flame. And then you would also have come here and whine about the shitty system.

You have to go for bad behaviour several times before you get punished.

And if you want to tell me that someone which is running down mid doesn't get punished then please give it a try. Start a game, run down mid the whole game and post the link from the match history. If you are not banned for 14 days after that game after at least 48H I will gift you a random skin box.

The statistical odds of having an afk or intentional feeder on your team is lower  than the odds of having one on the opposing team as long as you never do it, four chances as opposed to five.

If you are stuck in lower ranks then it is because you are failing in some aspect.

When people are caught intentionally feeding they are inmediately issued a 14 day ban, with their next punishment being a permenant ban. Just report them and they will get what is coming.

The main issue with issueing intentional feeding bans is that a lot of people dont understand the word "intentional" which leads to a lot of false reports.

As for afk's, they are handled primarily by the leaver buster which gives people low priority queues for leaving too many games and if they keep it up for too long they get banned. 

Personally I would like to see it work quicker but that would lead to people with temporary internet issues getting harsh punishments.

Yelling or swearing at someone isn't going to make them stop, nor going to help you or your team work together to try to win the game. 
Keep your mouth shut and report the person at the end of the game. They will be punished if they are doing what you are saying they did
going afk only has a certain amount of impact, but the words you say can easily hurt other player's feelings much more than an afk can.

Its a huge problem. Riots automated system will ban people instantly based on chat logs with virtually no context whatsoever, but their automated system against afking/feeding/trolling is extremely ineffective.
